description: Tine Nys's family say her request to die after a relationship ended should never have been granted.
title: Belgium euthanasia: Three doctors accused in unprecedented trial
title_page: Belgium euthanasia: Three doctors accused in unprecedented trial - BBC News
maintext: The 38-year-old had suffered a childhood of severe psychiatric problems and had tried to take her own life when she was younger. But her sisters, Lotte and Sophie, are adamant she was not incurably ill, as Belgian law requires, but suffering from the stress of a broken relationship. She had not had psychiatric treatment for 15 years.
